title: DOMESTIC AND RESIDENTIAL ELECTRICAL INSTALLATION
fullText:
The installation requirements, for battery types that are categorized as fire hazard level 1 in Table 3.1, installed in a domestic or residential electrical installation, are as follows:
(a) Shall be in a detached non-habitable building or purpose-built structure.
(b) Materials and installation methods that minimize the spread of fire shall be selected and applied.
(c) Shall not be installed inside or under a building containing habitable rooms.
